name: FLEUR - demo
description:
My entry for "The Great Spring Game Jam" - hosted by Firith

Spring always makes me think of flowers blooming. For the jam, I decided to do my take on a "Candy Crush-esque" puzzle concept game (minus the match-3... haha.)

While in development, I decided that I wanted to release a larger version of this project -- hence, the "Demo" title -- with many more levels, abilities, obstacles, trophies, leaderboards, and more! Big thanks to Firith for putting this gamejam on and getting me so inspired!

If you enjoy the game, be sure to follow me for details on when the full-version will be released! I'll be tweaking it for the rest of the month, so probably early-mid April! All feedback and suggestions welcome in the comments! I want to make this great! 

Thank you for playing! 

-RJ

----------

Note before playing: No Tutorial! - I ran out of time towards the end of the jam... but I've inserted a "Help" section in the game which explains all the rules that can be toggled with a click or the "H" key. I've included those  instructions below along with some gameplay and control notes!

----------

GAMEPLAY:

In the game you must Harvest as many flowers as you can to build up your score. The game ends when the timer runs out, or if flowers on the play field stack up too high.

CONTROLS:

Left Mouse: Click Flowers and Use Abilities

Hotkeys (1,2,3,4,5): Another way to use abilities

Esc: Quit to Menu/Quit Game

----------

HELP/TUTORIAL:

As stated earlier, I ran out of time for a proper tutorial (I will be adding one into the full version!) Below you'll find all the information you need to play the game:

**The Master Flower at the top of the screen changes colors every few
seconds

**Click flowers that match the Master Flower to harvest them

**When the Master Flower is rainbow colored, you may harvest any flower

**As you progress, the speed of the game will increase

**TIP: Two or more of the same flower stacked in a column will auto-harvest

**Use your abilities beneath the playfield to help you clear flowers faster

**You can click abilities or use their hotkeys (1,2,3,4,5) to activate them when their cooldown expires

**Hover over abilities to see what they do (in the tooltip section)

**The game ends when the time expires or when flowers reach the white line near the top of the board

Press (H) to hide or bring up this menu in game.

- - - - - - - -

Thank again for playing! I hope your harvest was plentiful! And please let me know any comments or feedback you may have for the upcoming full version!

-RJ
